thread.title: great location, small, quiet with superb staff
thread.title_full: great location, small, quiet with superb staff - Review of Hotel Henriette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew D
title: great location, small, quiet with superb staff
text: We like this hotel a lot. It was quite chic and the staff stood out as being super-friendly and helpful. Highly recommended. The location is great with loads and loads of top quality restaurants within easy walking distance. The morrocan restaurant directly opposite, the Scirocco was great.
